Name: Da Lat City Street Food Tour By Motorbike With Local Guide
Description:
Experience the hearty highland flavors of Da Lat’s street food on a private motorbike tour with a foodie guide. Savor enough tastings to make a full meal and ask as many questions as you'd like with your guide on hand to translate. Meet your guide at your hotel and hop on the back of a motorbike to begin your culinary adventure. Cruise through the streets of Da Lat and stop at various food stalls to sample local specialties. Taste a variety of dishes, including bánh mì, a Vietnamese sandwich, and bánh xèo, a crispy pancake. Sip on a refreshing glass of Vietnamese iced coffee and try a bowl of bún bò Huế, a spicy beef noodle soup, break with meat balls, hot pot, Etc. As you eat, learn about the history and culture of Vietnamese cuisine from your guide. After you've had your fill, return to your hotel.

Name: Da Lat - 2 Days 1 night tour: Camping & Chasing The Sea Of Cloud
Description:
What sets our camping tour apart is our focus on providing a truly intimate experience with nature.
Our camping spots are carefully selected to give you the peace you need to fully appreciate your surroundings.
One of the highlights of our tour is the opportunity to witness some of the most stunning natural phenomena that Da Lat has to offer.
Imagine waking up early to watch the sunrise over the rolling hills, or gazing up at the night sky as the Milky Way stretches out above you.
You may even be lucky enough to catch a glimpse of a shooting star streaking across the sky.
But it's not just about the views – our tour also offers plenty of hands-on experiences that will give you a deeper appreciation for the outdoors.
You'll have the chance to set up your own tent, build a campfire, and learn about basic camping skills. And chatting and sharing stories with other campers, you'll feel a sense of camaraderie and connection that's hard to find in the hustle and bustle of city life.

Name: Hike and Kayak with exploring Tuyen Lam Lake in Da Lat
Description:
8.5 km of moderate hiking to the beautiful kayaking area.
Pick up and transfer in city.
Picnic lunch.
The trailhead starts just south of Dalat and a short 15 minute vehicle transfer. We head up from 1,500 meters in elevation to the ridgeline which meanders between 1,650 and 1,700 meters.
This 8.5 km hike heads up along a jungle fringed ridgeline just south of town. This lonely trail charges up to its peak elevation early on and then gently rolls before heading down to the lake where our kayaks are located. You will be treated to a picnic lunch prepared by the guide, taking advantage of the many fruits and vegetable grown in the Dalat area.
After lunch, we will explore the far end of the lake on the kayaks and spend the remainder of the day exploring the many inlets and secret spots. The area is also known as the most popular spots in Vietnam for bird watching. A great day out for those who love to be on the water.
Did we mention that the lake is also great for swimming!!
